item.description:
Technical Director
Shanghai, China

I am a Senior Software Engineer currently working at a large game out-sourcing company in Shanghai (China). In the past I have worked at various other big companies in the Netherlands including Guerrilla Games (Amsterdam) and ICT (Rotterdam). I am passionate about Software Engineering and Technology. Apart from Game-Development and C++/C#/Go I have special interest in high performance C and C++ as well as embedded systems.
